nodes.name: DappStorage
setMethodAuthorization
getMethodAuthorization
DappStorage
setMethodAuthorization
getMethodAuthorization

devdoc.author: Olivier Van Den Biggelaar - <olivier@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Contract storing the state of wallets related to authorised dapps. The contract only defines basic setters and getters with no logic. Only modules authorised for a wallet can modify its state.

getMethodAuthorization(address,address,a.details: Gets the authorization status for an external contract's method.

params._dapp: The address of the signing key.

getMethodAuthorization(address,address,a.return: true if the method is whitelisted, false otherwise

setMethodAuthorization(address,address,a.details: (De)authorizes an external contract's methods to be called by a dapp key of the wallet.

params._authorized: true to whitelist, false to blacklist.
params._dapp: The address of the signing key.

devdoc.title: DappStorage
